title: Merry Meals
description: I was responsible for integrating the back-end with the front-end in the Merry Meals program, which is a charitable organization that prepares and delivers hot, nutritious meals to adults who are unable to cook or maintain their nutritional status due to age, disease, or disability. The back-end was developed using Spring Boot and utilized a MySQL database, while the front-end was built using ReactJS, and my role was to ensure efficient communication between the website interface and the database.

title: School Tuition Payment
description: The School Tuition Payment program is a web-based application that facilitates the payment process for school tuition fees. It utilizes the PHP programming language to connect the website interface to a secure MySQL database, allowing for seamless transactions between students and the school administration.
